mapper.update: update caedictionarysubject set `number` = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `level` = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parentId = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, departmentId = #{departmentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isEffective = #{iseffective,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startTime = #{starttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where subjectId = #{subjectid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select subjectId, `number`, `level`, parentId, departmentId, `name`, isEffective, startTime, endTime from caedictionarysubject where subjectId = #{subjectid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select subjectId, `number`, `level`, parentId, departmentId, `name`, isEffective, startTime, endTime from caedictionarysubject
